bug.author: tanaysoni
bug.summary: Inferencer configs are not set when loading a model from local dir
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Issue</denchmark-h>
When loading Inferencer with a model saved on local dir, the Inferencer.load()'s params like max_seq_len and doc_stride are ignored and their value gets set from the saved config files. A user would intend that the supplied params override the saved configs. <denchmark-h:h3>Possible solution</denchmark-h>
Inferencer uses Processor.load_from_dir() to load a processor instance from local dir. This can be refactored to accept params that override the config file.
